Articles.Content:
I have all the Near Future mods, MechJeb, and SCANsat installed on the latest 32bit version of KSP, on Windows 7.

When i unlock a new node on the tech tree it doesnt automatically show the next set of available nodes. i have to close the science center and open it again.

Anyone got any ideas what is causing this, i have installed Near Future to the letter of its instructions. and i didnt have this problem when i just had MJ and SCANsat.

Edited November 9, 2014 by ohlookabirdie

Are you using the Near Future tech tree? Last time I checked, that had big red letters all over it saying it was broken for 0.25. I'd double check that first. If the mod's page still says the NFT tech tree is broken, I'd get rid of it and see if that happens.

Moved this to the modded support forum.

Cheers,

~Claw
